scripts.build:compile: yarn dev:format && yarn build:clean && react-scripts build
scripts.build:copy: rimraf ../bundle/frontend/build && recursive-copy build ../bundle/frontend/build && cd ../frontend_deploy && recursive-copy index.js ../bundle/frontend/index.js && recursive-copy package.json ../bundle/frontend/package.json
scripts.build:full: yarn build:compile && yarn build:copy && yarn build:clean
